projects.title: Smart Home Energy Monitor
projects.description: Real-time energy consumption monitoring system with AI-powered optimization suggestions.
features: Machine learning predictions for energy usage
projects.impact: Reduces household energy costs by an average of 23% through intelligent monitoring and automation.

projects.title: Autonomous Delivery Drone
projects.description: AI-powered drone capable of autonomous package delivery in urban environments.
projects.impact: Enables zero-emission last-mile delivery with 60% faster delivery times in test areas.

projects.title: Water Purification System
projects.description: Solar-powered water purification device for remote communities.
projects.impact: Provides clean drinking water to over 5,000 people in 12 remote villages.

projects.title: Robotic Prosthetic Arm
projects.description: Advanced prosthetic arm with neural interface for natural movement control.
projects.impact: Restores 85% of natural hand functionality at 40% of traditional prosthetic costs.

projects.title: Smart Farming Assistant
projects.description: IoT-based crop monitoring and automated irrigation system for precision agriculture.
projects.impact: Increases crop yields by 35% while reducing water usage by 45%.

projects.title: Traffic Flow Optimizer
projects.description: AI system that optimizes traffic light timing to reduce congestion in real-time.
projects.impact: Reduces average commute times by 28% in pilot city implementations.

projects.title: Modular Recycling Station
projects.description: Automated sorting and processing system for residential recycling.
projects.impact: Increases recycling accuracy to 97% and reduces contamination by 80%.

projects.title: Emergency Response Quadruped
projects.description: Four-legged robot designed for search and rescue operations in hazardous environments.
projects.impact: Deployed in 15 disaster zones, assisting in locating 73 survivors.

projects.title: Portable Wind Turbine
projects.description: Compact, deployable wind turbine for off-grid power generation.
projects.impact: Provides reliable power for remote research stations and emergency shelters.

projects.title: Neural Network Health Monitor
projects.description: Wearable device that uses AI to detect early signs of health issues.
projects.impact: Early detection of cardiac events with 94% accuracy in clinical trials.

projects.title: Smart Beehive System
projects.description: IoT monitoring system for commercial beekeeping operations.
projects.impact: Increases bee colony survival rates by 42% through early intervention.

projects.title: Automated Vertical Farm
projects.description: Fully automated indoor farming system with precision environmental control.
projects.impact: Produces 50x more food per square meter than traditional farming.

projects.title: Earthquake Early Warning Network
projects.description: Distributed sensor network for detecting and alerting about seismic activity.
projects.impact: Provides 10-30 seconds advance warning, saving lives in earthquake-prone regions.

projects.title: Adaptive Learning Platform
projects.description: AI-powered educational platform that adapts to individual learning styles.
projects.impact: Improves student performance by 45% compared to traditional learning methods.

projects.title: Ocean Cleanup Drone Fleet
projects.description: Autonomous surface drones that collect plastic waste from oceans.
projects.impact: Prototype collected 2 tons of plastic waste in 3-month trial period.

projects.title: Smart Fire Detection System
projects.description: Advanced fire detection using computer vision and multiple sensor types.
projects.impact: Reduces false alarms by 85% while detecting fires 3x faster than traditional systems.

projects.title: Exoskeleton for Construction Workers
projects.description: Wearable robotic exoskeleton that reduces physical strain in construction work.
projects.impact: Reduces work-related injuries by 60% and increases productivity by 35%.

projects.title: Air Quality Monitoring Mesh
projects.description: City-wide air quality monitoring network with real-time pollution mapping.
projects.impact: Helps 2 million residents make informed decisions about outdoor activities.

projects.title: Automated PCB Inspection System
projects.description: Computer vision system for detecting defects in printed circuit boards.
projects.impact: Achieves 99.8% defect detection accuracy, reducing warranty claims by 70%.

projects.title: Smart Parking Management
projects.description: AI-powered parking management system for urban areas.
projects.impact: Reduces time spent looking for parking by 40% in pilot cities.

projects.title: Biodegradable Electronics
projects.description: Electronic components made from biodegradable materials for sustainable tech.
projects.impact: Potential to eliminate billions of pounds of e-waste annually.

projects.title: Voice-Controlled Wheelchair
projects.description: Advanced wheelchair with voice control and autonomous navigation features.
projects.impact: Provides greater independence to individuals with limited mobility.
